subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation
author: Jody Cupp
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_007F_01C69470.921426C0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I agree.  I'm not one to go cemetaries.  And I did tell my contacts what I =
would be doing.  I get images of it being almost like an amusement park for=
 them.  Where they can go to have some fun with the physical. 

But the ene=
rgy here was amazing! It didn't feel bad at all. The only part of the cemet=
ary that gave me bad vibes was this old tree in the back. My husband said t=
hat by the way it looks it could have been a hanging tree.  They hung the c=
riminals there and buried them in the woods.  So that was more of a psychic=
 imprint from the past.

Jody

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Vick=
i Talbott 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 1:=
19 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation



  HI Frank,
  =
I don't think they do naturally hang around graveyards.  I think they are t=
here when we record or just let them know of our presence.  I know that Bra=
den and friends come to talk just about wherever we are, and that includes =
the graveyard.  Bayview Cemetery is considered one of the most haunted in W=
ashington state and is just down the road from me and Mary Jo.  Once we wen=
t into the mausoleum there, where it was pretty darn scary.  Neither of us =
got an EVP or an anomalous photo there, despite the strange vibes.  Vicki

=
  Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
    Those are interesting=
 for a graveyard. I wouldn't think the dead would hang around grave yards, =
that's why it' not my first choice to record at. Gonna have to re-think som=
e of my pre-conceptions!
     Frank

--------------------------------------=
--------------------------------------

    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [=
mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Jody Cupp
    Sent: Tuesday, J=
une 20, 2006 10:22 AM
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] from my ohio investigation
    Here is two more.. LOL.. I need to mot=
ivate myself to make the web page. blahh
    Any way.  There was this one G=
rave that we believed was Elizabeths.  We went over there 3 times and could=
 smell lilacs after awhile.  It wasn't immediate, it just slowly came upon =
us. There was nothing around us to create that odor (not even in the woods)=
, so I'm guessing they were sending it to us. When I say "what are these" I=
 was picking up some of those purple flowers that grow from clover.  They d=
id not produce the scent we were smelling!! It was incredible.  I have expe=
rienced this before and to me, it means close to the same thing as roses.  =
A welcoming, of love and peace.
